name: To Kill a Mockingbird

about: A memoir of leaving a survivalist family and pursuing an education.

about: A humanizing portrait of Albert Einstein, blending science with personal narrative.

about: The story of the woman whose cells changed medical research forever.

name: Steve Jobs
about: The biography of Apples visionary co-founder, detailing his passion and perfectionism.

name: Thinking, Fast and Slow
about: An exploration of the dual systems that drive the way we think and make decisions.

about: A young girl finds solace by stealing books and sharing them during Nazi Germany.

about: A boy survives a shipwreck and shares a lifeboat with a Bengal tiger.

about: A deep dive into the mind and life of the genius Albert Einstein.

about: A moving story of friendship and betrayal set in Afghanistan.

about: Walter Isaacson’s biography of the complex Apple co-founder and visionary.
